title: RIP Roe, Netflix Courting Conservatives? 6.27.22
itunes:title: RIP Roe, Netflix Courting Conservatives? 6.27.22
description:
Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Nimesh Patel as they talk about life in a Post-Roe America, the abject failure of the fourth estate, Netflix leaning into the culture wars with their new reality show 'Snowflake Mountain and much more!

Listen: Berimbau - Bodikhuu

Donate to support abortion access
